articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: Jensen Huang says Nvidia went from 95% market share in China to 0% - Fortune
articles.description: "Before we leap towards policies that are hurtful to other people, take a step back and maybe reflect on what are the policies that are helpful to America."
articles.content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang urged nuance when it comes to regulating Chinas access to U.S. technologies that are critical to developing artificial intelligence.In an interview with Citadel Securities on … [+2635 chars]
